track.name: Light Up the Sky
comments: The mastering is so bad. [8]
This song means the world to me ♥ Thank you, Christina.
this song is absolutely amazing. period.
what kind of earth-shattering vocals ♥
now we have wings, we can fly. we can be the kings you and i. wipe away the tears from our eyes. we light up the skyyyyyyy ♥
The mastering is so bad. [7]

We can be kings you and I ♥ Probably the most meaningful Xtina song for me ever... whenever I listen to this song I will always be reminded of someone I never thought I could have and who I only dreamt of before and now things are so different and I'm just bursting with happiness :') I would have never believed this a couple of months ago when I first heard the song & thought about that person <3 But apparently dreams do come true.
As we stand together, chase our dreams forever ♥
too good to be just a bonus track [13]

The mastering is so bad. [4] yess
The mastering is so bad. [3] The same for 'Best Of Me'. Amazing song, terrible mastering.
when skies are grey Xtina light my way <3
The mastering is so bad. [2]
The mastering is so bad.
Now we have wings we can fly, we can be kings you and I ♥
